links.*: The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion

wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[10 January|10]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (10 January 1947)|a letter to A.W. Riddle]].
==March==
* '''?''' - J.R.R. Tolkien, [[Edith Bratt|Edith]] and [[Priscilla Tolkien|Priscilla]] move from [[20 Northmoor Road]] to [[3 Manor Road]], [[Oxford]].<ref>{{HM|RC}}, p. lxxiv</ref>
==May==
* '''[[5 May|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 107a]].
==June==
* '''[[3 June|3]]''' - Actor [[Matthew Locricchio]] is born.
==July==
* '''[[5 July|5]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 108]].
* '''[[19 July|19]]''' - Author and scholar [[Colin Duriez]] is born.
* '''[[28 July|28]]''' - [[Rayner Unwin]] reports on the first version of  ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''.
* '''[[31 July|31]]''' -  J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 109]].
==August==
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] makes the drawing ''[[New Lodge, Stonyhurst]]''.
* '''[[20 August|20]]''' - Artist [[Alan Lee]] is born.
* '''[[25 August|25]]''' - Artist [[Michael Kaluta]] is born.
==September==
* '''[[20 September|20]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 110]].
* '''[[21 September|21]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 111]].
* '''[[26 September|26]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith (26 September 1947)|a letter to Jennifer Brookes-Smith]].
* '''[[26 September|26]]''' - Actor [[Graham Faulkner]] is born.
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 111a]].
* '''[[30 September|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Rosemary (30 September 1947)|a letter to Rosemary]].
*'''?''' - Tolkien, a fellow of Merton College, visits the college's estates in [[Cambridge]].

==October==
* '''[[2 October|2]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to A.W. Riddle (2 October 1947)|a letter to A.W. Riddle]].
* '''[[14 October|14]]''' - Author [[David Day]] is born.
==November==
* '''[[30 November|30]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 112]].
==December==
* '''[[4 December|4]]''' - ''[[Essays Presented to Charles Williams]]'', including "[[On Fairy-Stories]]", is published.
* '''[[10 December|10]]''' - [[Douglas C. Kenney]], co-author of ''[[Bored of the Rings (book)|Bored of the Rings]]'', is born.
* '''[[17 December|17]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter to Malcolm Knox|a letter to Malcolm Knox]].
* '''?''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Simonne d'Ardenne|S.R.T.O. d'Ardenne]]'s essay "'iþþlen' in ''Sawles Warde''" is published in ''[[English Studies (December 1947)|English Studies]]''.

==?==
* '''?''' - The first translation of one of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works, ''[[The Hobbit]]'' (as ''[[Hompen]]''), is published.
* '''?''' - [[Ruth S. Noel]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Peter Kjærulff]] is born.
